attributes.description: The frequency of sensor data updates for flight computations.
attributes.name: sensorUpdateRate

attributes.description: Level of system redundancy to maintain operational integrity.
attributes.name: systemRedundancy

attributes.description: Data security encryption standard for safeguarding communication.
attributes.name: communicationEncryption

attributes.description: Accuracy level for flight path determination.
attributes.name: pathAccuracy

designScenario.description: The Flight Management System (FMS) integrates advanced avionic functionalities to ensure seamless flight operations, optimizing navigation, enhancing safety, and facilitating communication.
designScenario.name: Flight Management System

details.description: Process dynamic flight routes using real-time geographic and atmospheric data.
Adapt routes based on potential airspace obstructions or constraints.
Transition between autonomous operation modes within permissible extra handling time limits.
Update guidance commands immediately following sensor input integration.
Maintain primary functions in scenarios of partial sensor failure through subsystem cross-validation.
Alert operators in instances of configuration or operational anomalies.
Enable seamless firmware updates without affecting system availability.
Design ergonomic user interfaces for quick assimilation by aviation professionals.

relationships.description: The core processing unit translates navigation modules' outputs into actionable commands.
The interface module interacts directly with external communication frameworks for accurate data exchange.
Aggregates environmental data for the navigation computations.

subComponents.description: Computes flight dynamics and trajectory planning.
subComponents.name: Trajectory Calculation Engine

systemComponents.description: Modules for determining aircraft positioning and monitoring environmental conditions.
systemComponents.name: Navigation Modules

subComponents.description: Monitors atmospheric conditions affecting flight routes.
subComponents.name: Barometric Altimeter

systemComponents.description: Facilitates communication between the FMS and external systems.
systemComponents.name: External Communication Unit

rag_context: Flight Management System (FMS) is an integrated avionics solution providing critical flight planning, navigation, and autopilot interfacing capabilities. It processes sensor inputs from multiple navigational instruments, optimizes flight trajectories, manages fuel consumption, and interfaces with both onboard and external communication networks. The system ensures high reliability, precision, and compliance with safety standards crucial for modern aeronautical operations. The system's attributes include update frequency of 1Hz, redundancy level of Dual or Triple Modular Redundancy, processing cycle time of 100ms, sensor accuracy within 5 meters positional accuracy, and security protocol levels using AES-256 and RSA encryption. The requirements involve computing optimal flight trajectories, integrating with autopilot systems, interfacing with weather data services and airport databases, and providing real-time updates to pilots and flight crew regarding flight status, fuel consumption, and estimated time of arrival.
